review: Dr Megh redefined the process of dental treatment to a comfortable ,easy , pain less mode and friendly process from a existing process of stress , fear and tension which usually prevails in the mind of a patient. . Sit with him for any process of treatment and post treatment next hour you may go back to office for your important  work meeting , That much smooth and expertise treatment he offers to his patients. Going to him is more of a going to family friend and not going to a Dental Surgeon. Strongly and highly recommended to all , before going to any other Dentist , please come to him and experience his service of treatment , sure you will not go back to any other dentist in life.
reply_text: Thank you Sir for your kind words. It was my pleasure.

review: This is a great place to go and take care of your teeth. Professional and Courteous. The dentist Megh Sharat was very nice and informative. I call him because he made me feel right at home and provided excellent service. I felt i was in good hands and he took care of my teeth. The quality of service is amazing and fantastic results.
reply_text: Thank you Mr. Chowdhury, it was a pleasure serving you, as well. Please remember, rinse properly.

review: Dentist are scary but not this one. Dr. Megh made my mother calm down, chat a little bit, made her easy and did his job. My mother has to go for some extractions and more which we will do in our upcoming visit.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
The doctor listens patiently, and provides simple advice and explanation for the treatment. If you are scared of dental treatment, the doctor makes you understand in a simple and easy manner.
Overall I had a comfortable experience.
reply_text: Thank you for your patience Sir

review: The doc is very friendly with good behaviour and soft spoken. Examined very nicely and treated it well. Will recommend it to my family and friends.
reply_text: Thank you Sir, for your kind words. It was a learning experience for me too.

reply_text: Thank you Sir for your kind response. It was my duty and i am always ready to help.
